Title: The 2010 World Expo in Shanghai China -- "Educational Wall Charts Entering Primary and Secondary Schools across the Country" Theme Activity
Designer: PRC Education Ministry (中华人民共和国教育部)Xinhua tongxun she (新华通讯社)
Notes: The poster shows photographs of earlier World Exhibitions or their landmarks, including Crystal Palace (London, 1851), Eiffel Tower (Paris, 1889), Atomium (Brussels, 1958), Osaka (1970), Seattle (1962), and the Chinese section in the 1982 Knoxville Exhibition.The poster was sponsored by China Post (中国邮政).
Tags: 中国2010年上海世界博览会
